channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why should I tip servers who earn $20 an hour?
item.description: “It seems the whole point of tipping was to make up for low wages, and that is no longer an issue.”

item.description: “I’ve had a wonderful relationship with my father as well as my stepmother.”

item.title: Google unveils open source Gemma 3 model with 128k context window
item.description: Google's Gemma 3 is multimodal, comes in four sizes and can now handle more information and instructions thanks to a larger context window.

item.description: AI-powered cybersecurity threats include deepfakes, automating breaches, and morphing malware in real time, challenging cyberdefenses.
